info.title: Modules mailer mechanism
info.description: Sends specific mails to users for specific reasons. These mails come from the platform.

method.name: send
method.description: Send an email to a specific user.

parameter.name: $mailPath
parameter.description: The path of the mail message inside the module resources.

parameter.name: $recipients
parameter.description: For one recipient, use the email address directly. For many recipients, use an array as: mail => name.

parameter.name: $attributes
parameter.description: An array of attributes to personalize the email. This can include names and other user information.

parameter.name: $mailType
parameter.description: The mail recipient type. You can choose to send mail 'to', 'cc' or 'bcc'. Use class constants. Default value is MAIL_TYPE_TO.

method.returndescription: True on success, false or NULL on failure.
